name: Battle Alert HD
description:
√Better for iPad! Top war game as classic RTS game.
√English, German, Japanese, Chinese and Traditional Chinese and other 11 languages support !
√Battle Alert - Red Uprising is a legendary military strategy game.
You can build your base here.Train your army and fight against thousands of players from all around the world.

Download to experience a real and interesting war!
Upgrade your Marine, Air forces, Grizzle Tanks or other powerful units.
Lead your army to attack and get lots of resource.
It's time for you to rule the world in game!


= FEATURES =

√High freedom, multiple units combination, all are controlled by you.

√Base attack and defense game, you need to build a impregnable base.

√Unknown combat against thousands of players from all around the world.

√Plenty of units and multiple upgrade systems for over 20 kinds of units.

√Fight, protect, resource, units, mine...all you can imagine.

√Interesting campaign, legendary combat against field army.

We'd like to hear your suggestions or questions.

E-mail :ba_help@elex.com
